message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I can come down a bit to $13,000.  This product is really top-of-the-line and I'm confident you won't find a better deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my budget. I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
